ps0['Bucket Size'] = pd.cut(ps0['Size'], bins, labels=['0-20k','20k-40k','40k-60k','60k-80k','80k-100k'])
pd.pivot_table(ps0, values='Rating', index='Bucket Size', columns='Content Rating')
source.20ebd204:
